Finance

MainNewsin the fieldFinance♪ Minfin's latest decisions. Analytical articles and expert opinions.Financial financialprojections.

Central Bank RF recommended that banks minimize interaction with cryptomatals
The RF Centre recommended that banking institutions minimize participation in crypt-based operations. Transactions are defined as the acquisition of digital currencies on exchanges, promotion of related services and digital assets, whose returns are related to their rates.
19:58, 29 February
Russia banned the export of petrol as of 1 March
The ban on the sale of petrol abroad will be applied in the Russian Federation for six months.
19:40, 29 February
Vedev ' s economist said that it was worth abolishing the mandatory sale of currencies by exporters.
The question of extending the compulsory sale of foreign exchange earnings for exporters has again been actively discussed by business and government representatives. Companies complain to high commissions when converting currency, and Central Bank offers no extension of the measure. On the other hand, the Cabinet considers that it is the mandatory sale of foreign exchange earnings that stabilized the ruble.
19:28, 29 February
Experts: The euro will remain in the coming weeks near 100 roubles
Financial experts stated that the European exchange rate would soon be between 97 and 102 roubles.
18:52, 29 February
The former shoe factory is sold in Tumeni for 439 million roubles
The real estate is 5.8 thousand square metres.
18:41, 29 February
More people in the Murmansk region have borrowed
The inhabitants of the region have become more likely to take mortgages, retail loans and credit cards.
17:17, 29 February
Economist Shediko reported what investment was more beneficial than the contribution.
Doctor of Economic Sciences, Yuri She said what investment in current conditions was more beneficial than bank contributions.
16:57, 29 February
In the Murmansk region, a salary arrears commission will be established
The commission will be composed of representatives of the Ministry of Internal Affairs, the Labour Inspectorate, the Social Fund Office, FAS and Murmanskstat.
16:38, 29 February
In Minfin, the external calculations were supported by mosquitoes in the Russian Federation
The Ministry of Finance stated that the draft Mining Act, which allowed for the use of international cryptitudes in the Russian Federation, could be adopted at the current session of the State.
16:34, 29 February
The economist explained to whom the contribution of the floating bet was convenient.
The economist Nikolai Kuznetsov said that the contribution to the floating bid could be convenient for a certain category of customers.
15:40, 29 February
Putin: New insurance guarantees and savings certificates are launched
At the time of appeal to the Federal Assembly, Vladimir Putin announced the commencement of insurance guarantees and tax deductions for investments.
15:28, 29 February
The multifunctional sports unit will be available in Murmansk in 2026
Deputies supported the decision to transfer project design documents from municipal ownership to the region.
13:41, 29 February
Vladimir Putin has announced plans to raise the MLT to 35,000 roubles
The rate of increase in the minimum wage was discussed during the communication to the Federal Assembly.
13:21, 29 February
Currency revenues have declined in Cuba
The reason has been for the withdrawal of one federal territory from the region.
13:10, 29 February
In January, inflation in Astrakhan province increased to 7.5 per cent
However, the indicator was lower than for the USO and Russia as a whole.
12:38, 29 February
“It is not true”: Zaharova claims that Russia should not owe India $774 million
The World Bank has provided data, allegedly the duty of Russia to India is $774 million.
11:18, 29 February
ACV began to pay Qiwi premiums
Payments to Kiwi Bank ' s investors will begin on 29 February and have been made to the Investment Insurance Agency.
10:06, 29 February
In the fight against the subtopics, the Krasnodar will spend 92 million roubles
Some 330 items will be purchased.
10:00, 29 February
The net profits of Rosgostraha fell to 5 billion roubles
The net profits of Rosgostraha decreased by 26 per cent last year to 4.95 billion roubles.
09:51, 29 February
Proceeds from advertising in Telegram are illegal in Russia
In March 2024, a new promotion platform will be launched in Telegram, and Pavel Durov informed. It will work in 100 countries around the world.
09:22, 29 February
